description:
Christian is 24 but I think he still has that baby face thing going on. He looks a lot younger.
He was a little nervous doing this video. Not that he isn't confident about his cock size. It is truly on the endowed side of things. He just had never been filmed. He has messed around with guys on occasion, but he stuck to girls getting ass-rammed to keep himself going.
I put him at the computer so he could focus and feel like he was at home. SPOILER: Also, he banged up his knee and shin REALLY bad playing baseball, so I was trying to shoot him above the knee. War wounds like this were not going to add to his rough and tumble sexiness.
But that big cock of his is a shooter. He actually hit me as I stood behind him to get a POV of his cum shot. He coats his face, shoulder, and you can tell one stream overshoots his shoulder and heads in my direction.
He seems down with guy on guys stuff, but wants to start off slowly. So definitely will have him back for at least an oral.
title: Christian - Solo
